name: P3-Playlist-App
description: # Schema ``` const Song = new Schema(   {     title: { type: String, required: true },     artist: { type: String, required: true },     releaseYear: { type: String, required: true },     genre: { type: String, required: true },     albumCover: { type: String, required: true },     album: {type: String, required: true},     songLength: { type: String, required: true },     // rating: {rating: Number, userId: String}     // ratings: [{ rating: Number, songId: { type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, ref: 'songs' } }] (will be added post mvp)   },   { timestamps: true } );
